name: Sammy
desc: Graduated from Germany's Institute of Culinary and Fine Arts, he has mastered the technique of creating the finest meals with only the tools he can obtain. Might be a Nazi.

name: Yamamoo
desc: Experienced in the field of roasting and grilling, he specializes in delicate smoking process of foods and maintaining their flavour till' the plate of the customer.

name: Ernest
desc: An advocate in the field of coffee brewing, he is a barista with passion and love, brewing the coffee with full attention to the quality coffee beans we possess.
quote: - I have a bad feeling about this.
